Authors: Akihiko Kinoshita, Hiromi Sasaki, Kazuhide Nara
Title:

inferred from molecular phylogenetic analyses
Keywords:
Asia, convergent evolution, ectomycorrhizal fungi,
saprophytic fungi, hypogeous, false-truffle, multi-locus phylogeny
